pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, February 17, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Nassau, The Bahamas

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa, Canada.                       

Closed to media

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability.

Third floor foyer
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery.
